props.name: href
props.description: URL to be used for the Link. (The `href` is passed to the underlying `<a>` element. If `as` is specified, the link behavior may need different props).

props.name: muted
props.description: Uses a less prominent shade for Link color, and the default link shade on hover

props.name: inline
props.description: Tag link inside a text block

props.name: hoverColor
props.description: Color used when hovering over link
